sqlMap.insert:
insert into u_role (id,type, product_type, name, desc_, is_available, is_deleted, version_no, create_userid, create_username, create_userip, create_usermac, create_time, create_time_db, server_ip, update_userid, update_username, update_userip, update_usermac, update_time, update_time_db, client_versionno, company_id, platform_id,code,entity_type, entity_id) values (#id:BIGINT#,#type:BIGINT#, #productType:INTEGER#, #name:VARCHAR#, #desc:VARCHAR#, #isAvailable:INTEGER#, #isDeleted:INTEGER#, #versionNo:INTEGER#, #createUserid:BIGINT#, #createUsername:VARCHAR#, #createUserip:VARCHAR#, #createUsermac:VARCHAR#, #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, #createTimeDb:TIMESTAMP#, #serverIp:VARCHAR#, #updateUserid:BIGINT#, #updateUsername:VARCHAR#, #updateUserip:VARCHAR#, #updateUsermac:VARCHAR#, #updateTime:TIMESTAMP#, #updateTimeDb:TIMESTAMP#, #clientVersionno:VARCHAR#, #companyId:BIGINT#, #platformId:BIGINT#,#code:VARCHAR#,#entityType:INTEGER#, #entityId:BIGINT#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
